analysis.description: HNCToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol:
	Contract HNCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

HNCToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#300)

HNCToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/21/0xb8cdbb9159e719fd187803fc939a5799d090f605.sol#326-327
